content:
The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported the loss of Russians in the last day, as well as their total losses since the beginning of a large -scale invasion.

The data released the General Staff of the Armed Forces on the morning of March 23.

The losses of Russians are:

personnel - 435 760 (+1050) persons liquidated

tanks - 6852 (+12)

combat armored vehicles - 13 130 (+19)

artillery systems - 10 811 (+36)

RSWW - 1018 (0)

air defense facilities - 723 (0)

aircraft - 347 (0)

helicopters - 325 (0)

UAV Operative-tactical level-8763 (+75)

Winged missiles - 1992 (+39)

ships / boats - 26 (0)

submarines - 1 (0)

automobile equipment and tanks - 14 344 (+57)

Special equipment - 1768 (+19).

The data is specified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!
title: RF losses: 1050 invaders were eliminated, 19 BBM and 36 artismen were destroyed
description: The data released the General Staff of the Armed Forces in the morning of March 23. The losses of Russians are: personnel --.....
author: Army Inform
